description: Episode of Series "E.F.V.A. Primary Botany". Starts with a clear visual explanation of the importance of sunlight to plants. Time-lapse photography shows in a dramatic way the methods by which plants climb, for example, using twining stems and different kinds of tendril. Suitable for primary level.
